name: burnout-risk-prediction-system
description: Production-ready burnout risk prediction system for hybrid and remote teams - Created by Harish S & Team

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:ml
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:ml
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:ml
scripts.lint:ml: cd ml && flake8 src/ tests/ && black --check src/ tests/ && isort --check-only src/ tests/
scripts.format:all: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend && npm run format:ml
scripts.format:ml: cd ml && black src/ tests/ && isort src/ tests/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run format:all
scripts.ci: npm run lint:all && npm run test:all && npm run build:all

author: Harish S & Team
